unstructured.content: We're looking for general liability coverage that would protect us from claims related to our manufacturing process. Our current policy is set to expire next month.
We had one incident last year where an employee was injured while operating machinery, but our safety record overall is very good. The total claim amount was around $50,000.
Our budget for insurance this year is approximately $120,000. We currently have general liability coverage of $2M and property insurance for our three facilities.
We also want to ensure our commercial auto fleet is properly covered. We have 12 vehicles in total, mostly delivery trucks and some company cars.
